message.text: One of our beacons needs to be replaced because it isn't working. Please pickup a replacement beacon from NSH 4522.

payload.text:
Once you have the new beacon, head to the beacon location marked in orange on this map.
Take the old one down and put the new beacon in its place.

message.text: After completing this final step, please return the beacon your removed from the wall to NSH 4522.
